derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French mangeure, based on Latin manducat- 'chewed' (see manducate)

entry.def: A manger is a low open container which cows, horses, and other animals feed from when indoors.

means.word_mean: 1. a container (usually in a barn or stable) from which cattle or horses feed
